gameElement

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameElement.Match

  • public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a game with several sleeve.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Match(java.lang.String playerName1, java.lang.String playerName2, Mode mode, boolean option)
      The constructor of the class which initializes the attributes.

      The second constructor of the class, uses in the case of the continuation of a match.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Match

        public Match(java.lang.String playerName1,
             java.lang.String playerName2,
             Mode mode,
             boolean option)
        The constructor of the class which initializes the attributes.
        Parameters:
        option - The boolean which says if the option is activated.
        mode - The selected mode.
        playerName1 - The name of the first player.
        playerName2 - The name of the second player.

      • Match

        public Match(java.lang.String playerName1,
             java.lang.String playerName2,
             Mode mode,
             boolean option,
             int scorePlayer1,
             int scorePlayer2,
             java.lang.String filename,
             java.lang.String fileCurrentGame)
        The second constructor of the class, uses in the case of the continuation of a match.
        Parameters:
        playerName1 - The name of the first player.
        playerName2 - The name of the second player.
        mode - The selected mode by the users.
        option - The boolean which represents the option which is the display of the possible squares for a pawn.
        scorePlayer1 - The score of the first player.
        scorePlayer2 - The score of the second player.
        filename - The name of the file for the settings of the match. data/saved_match+i+.txt
        fileCurrentGame - The name of the file for the setting of the current game which is not finish. data/saved_game_for_match"+j+".txt

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        This method is the launcher of the match. In every cases, this is the only launcher to launch the match.

      • getSleeves

        public java.util.ArrayList<Game> getSleeves()
        This method is the getter of the attribute sleeves.
        Returns:
        The sleeves of the game.
